title: File a Property Tax Assessment Appeal
description: A homeowner believes their property tax assessment is too high and wants to file an appeal.

tasks.description: Identify the homeowner and their property parcel.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent locates the correct property record.

tasks.description: Explain the appeals process and provide the necessary forms.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent clearly explains the steps and provides a link to the appeal application form.

tasks.description: Accept the submitted appeal application and schedule a hearing with the assessment board.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent logs the appeal and schedules a hearing date.
